task.title: How to Properly Sit in an Office Chair
task.shortdesc: This section will describe how a customer should adjust his or her body to properly sit in a chair in an Airclassroom rental.

taskbody.context:
Woman in Chair
This task was adapted from WikiHow's "How to Sit" webpage.

step.cmd: Push your hips as far back as they can go in the chair
Keep your shoulders back and your back straight
Adjust the seat height to fit your body
Adjust the back of the chair to a 100°-110° reclined angle
Make sure that your upper and lower back are supported
